devdoc.details: Handles bUSDC payments between buyers and vendors Supports Quick Pay (amount only) and Invoice Pay (with metadata) Emits Receipt events for transaction tracking

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

calculateUSDCAmount(uint256).details: Calculate amount in USDC from GHS

completePayment(bytes32).details: Complete a payment by transferring bUSDC tokens

params.token: Token address to withdraw (0 for ETH)

params.limit: Maximum number of receipts to return

initiateInvoicePay(address,uint256,strin.details: Initiate an Invoice Pay transaction with metadata

markPaymentFailed(bytes32,string).details: Mark a payment as failed (admin or vendor only)

params.orderId: Order ID to mark as failed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PaymentRouter
